Header: Logistic Command in Kosgama Marks its 40th Anniversary
Content: Logistic Command Headquartered in Kosgama celebrated its 40th anniversary on Friday (3) together with Major General D.K.G.D Sirisena, Commander, Army Logistic Command. Troops presented a Guard Turnout and a Guard of Honour to the Logistic Commander on arrival at the premises. Afterwards he planted a sapling in the premises and added symbolic memory. An All Rank tea table afterwards brought everyone together. A Bodhi Pooja that followed in the evening was held at the Boralugoda Sriwardhanaramaya.
